extendedInfo.description: PicArts FaceSketch to Facebook - Sketch your Facebook!PicArts FaceSketch to Facebook is a simple, fun and useful Android application consists with the BEST sketching quality in both black & white and color sketching.Best of all, it is the first FREE photographic app which is fully intergraded with Facebook.You can browse both you and your friendsâ photos from Facebook through "PicArts FaceSketch to Facebook", and transform it using our amazing sketching function. More features please refer to the details below.Effects: -	Multiple Pencil Sketch-	Multiple Color SketchFeatures:*	Connect to your Facebook*	Browse photos from Facebook *	Browse photos of your friends from Facebook*	Display all photos from your phone*	Convert photos to multiple sketching effects*	User-Friendly and Easy-to-Use interface*	Directly display photos output *	Upload sketch photos to Facebook*	Save sketch photos to SD card *	Print out service for sketch photos and any photo by PicArts.net* Requires an Android 2.1 device or above. Recommended devices include : 1GHz single-core processor and 512MB main memory.- For iOS Version (Free), Please Visit:http://itunes.apple.com/app/id496391570- For iOS Version (Premium), Please Visit:http://itunes.apple.com/app/id498432643Keywords:PicArts , Facebook, Sketch, ColorSketch, Color Sketch, Pencil Sketch, Drawing, Sketching, Photo, Image, Album, Effect, Editor, Tools, Photography, PicArts.net
